actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a National Seashore on the Island of Guam, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Guam National Seashore to conserve and protect outstanding natural, scenic, and cultural values on the island of Guam. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands within the boundaries of such seashore.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a National Seashore on the Island of Guam, and for other purposes.
